DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate safety intravitreal ( IVT ) REGN2176-3 patient neovascular wet age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Safety Study With Intravitreal ( IVT ) REGN2176-3 Patients Aged 50 Years Older With Wet AMD
